p.k: The latest beauty trend in Tokyo is more diverse than ever! Learn some unique beauty services that you probably didn't know. Also, meet a makeup artist & hairstylist, who found a new way of working.
p.d: In this episode, we're bringing you the newest beauty trends, from hairstyles to makeup! Plus, we talk to young adults particular about their hair salons and a men's beauty YouTuber. And you won't want to miss an exclusive makeup tutorial from a famous hair and makeup artist!
